name: EVM Event Listener
description: Listen to and store any smart contract event from any EVM Blockchain. This can be useful to perform simple indexing tasks.

variables.name: WebSocket RPC URL
variables.description: Your WebSocket RPC URL endpoint must start with wss://

variables.name: Contract Address
variables.description: The address of your smart contract.

variables.name: Contract Event name
variables.description: Which smart contract event do you want to start tracking?

variables.name: From Block Number
variables.description: Which block do you want to start the indexing from?

variables.name: Custom Block Number
variables.description: Enter the custom block number you want to start with.
